title: srI naaradha naadha
sahitya:
shrI nArada nAda sarasIruha bhrnga shubhAnga

anupallavi

 dIna mAna rakSaka jagadIsha bhEshankEsha

caraNam

 vEda janitavara vInA vAdana tatvagjna khEdakara tritApa rahita khEcara vinuta 
yAdava kulajApta sadA mOda hrdaya munivarya shrIda tyAgarAja vinuta shrIkara mAm pAlaya
